ISSUE.TITLE: Can't login or register (ERR_TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: - Download NopCommerce 4.3 with code. - UnZip code to HD - Run in VS Version 16.6.0 Preview 2.1 - Install database in SQL Server V18.5 - After NopCommerce started I can't login or Register Error Message: Redirected many times! ERR_TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS - I tried http and https.
